column4: Micro$oft Security Essentials was useless, may as well have been AVG free.
You don't think MSE is any good? :-( ive been using it forever on my windows computer! Is there something more secure out?
I don't like M$ in general, but I've never seen their products to be overly reliable
before I moved over to Linux, I was using Comodo Security Suite, free and quite awesome, verbose and robust.
